text: For decades now, governments in Ottawa have been working for big corporations and powerful multi-millionaires at the expense of people. Halifax was hit hard by the hurricane, and many people still don’t have power. Thanks for the talk today, Mayor @MikeSavageHFX – we’ll keep in touch about how we can continue helping Haligonians rebuild & recover.pic.twitter.com/nw74OGDKX2

The @CanadianForces have been on the ground helping people out East recover from Hurricane Dorian. I got an update on the situation today and want to thank all of the women and men who are out there working hard. You’re making a big difference for so many communities here.pic.twitter.com/gcN39hWmia

Halifax a été durement touché par l’ouragan, et plusieurs personnes sont toujours privées d’électricité. Le maire @MikeSavageHFX et moi allons continuer à discuter des meilleurs manières d’aider les Haligoniens à reconstruire et à se remettre sur pied.pic.twitter.com/JP2JT9PUHE

Les @ForcesCanada sont présentes dans l’est du pays pour aider les citoyens suite au passage de l’ouragan Dorian. Je tiens à les remercier sincèrement pour le travail remarquable qu'ils font sur le terrain. Vous faites une réelle différence dans nos communautés.pic.twitter.com/kfhp4EkMWU

We can afford to help people like Gina in Hamilton when we have the courage to ask the super-rich to pay a little bit more to fund the services we all rely on. For Gina, that means universal pharmacare so that she can get the medication she needs to live. #elxn43pic.twitter.com/wXokQhYuor

Liberals & Conservatives have let the wealthiest avoid taxes & hide billions offshore, while life for people like Gina in Hamilton gets more expensive. I’m thankful for the efforts of the men and women in the @CanadianForces, first responders, and volunteers as Atlantic Canada recovers from Hurricane Dorian. The famous East Coast hospitality is also on full display as friends and neighbours help each other out. #ProudCanadian

Merci aux membres des @ForcesCanada, aux premiers intervenants et aux bénévoles qui aident le Canada atlantique à se remettre de l’ouragan Dorian. L’hospitalité de la côte est se manifeste pleinement quand des amis et des voisins s’entraident. #FierCanadien

4/ No Don, I have no problems attracting people to an event, see how many come to my rallies. Perhaps you should look at the Club’s Board of Directors and guess who ordered pulling the plug on this event and spreading this fake news.

3/ The event was confirmed on the afternoon of August 28 and the Club said they would begin selling tickets later that evening. But we were told very early **THE NEXT MORNING** that they were canceling the event, before anyone could buy tickets. Not selling enough tickets?

2/ Their words: ”Mr. Bernier’s exceptional record for leadership and his continuous mission to the improvement of Canadian freedoms and his distinct vision for our country is why we wish to have him address our audience on our podium.”

1/ Don, you may want to inquire a bit more on this story. @DonMartinCTV The Canadian Club wrote our Executive Director a very enthusiastic message inviting me to be the Premier Guest Speaker this season.https://twitter.com/DonMartinCTV/status/1171153197576142849 …

Possession charges disproportionately impact racialized & already marginalized Canadians. In Regina, Indigenous people were almost 9x more likely to be charged than white people. In Halifax, The number is 5x for Black Cdns. We need full & immediate expungement of these records.https://twitter.com/NDP/status/1171210431685373955 …

Today, I encourage all Canadians to join me in recognizing the lives taken from this world too soon by suicide, and in strengthening our resolve to do everything we can to prevent suicide in the future. #WSPD My statement: https://www.facebook.com/AndrewScheerMP/posts/2915472025153197 …pic.twitter.com/0okGN5RHQY

Aujourd’hui, j’encourage tous les Canadiens à se joindre à moi pour reconnaître les vies perdues trop tôt à cause du suicide et pour réitérer notre détermination à faire tout notre possible pour prévenir le suicide à l’avenir. #JMPS Ma déclaration : https://www.facebook.com/AndrewScheerMP/posts/2915461378487595 …pic.twitter.com/gGK7dAwhxF

Tonight in Toronto I was asked about what we'd do to help people struggling to afford the medication they need. The answer is universal pharmacare for all. No patchwork solutions – and no catering to big Pharma. We're in this for you. #elxn43pic.twitter.com/unXRwkCol6

Thank you to the powerful @PaulTaylorNDP for bringing together the community in Parkdale–High Park to talk about the challenges people face and how we'll make a difference in their lives. You could feel the excitment in & outside the room for a gov't that's in it for you. #elxn43pic.twitter.com/bmA4n5onYq

I also spoke with @BlaineHiggs, @MikeSavageHFX, @francoislegault, and @jonlapierre1806 today. When Canadians are in need, we are all there to help – and our government will continue lending a hand to help your communities rebuild and recover.

Right now, cleanup crews, first responders, soldiers, & volunteers are helping people in Eastern Canada after Hurricane Dorian. I visited the Government Operations Centre for a briefing on how things are going, and what support is still needed.pic.twitter.com/RtIKQYXRVt

Aujourd’hui, j'ai aussi parlé avec @BlaineHiggs, @MikeSavageHFX, @francoislegault et @jonlapierre1806. Lorsque les Canadiens sont dans le besoin, nous sommes tous là pour aider – et notre gouvernement continuera à aider vos communautés à se reconstruire et à se rétablir.

Des équipes de nettoyage, des premiers intervenants, des soldats et des bénévoles aident les gens dans l’Est du Canada suite à l’ouragan Dorian. J’ai visité le Centre des opérations du gouvernement pour une mise à jour de la situation et du soutien nécessaire.pic.twitter.com/lqvRfsRJ7a
